com.itextpdf.text.xml
Class XmlToTxt

java.lang.Object
  com.itextpdf.text.xml.XmlToTxt
All Implemented Interfaces:
SimpleXMLDocHandler
public class XmlToTxt
extends Object
implements SimpleXMLDocHandler

This class converts XML into plain text stripping all tags.
